abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.text: As long as your opponent has Kyogre, Kyogre ex, Groudon, or Groudon ex in play, Rayquaza ex's attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dragon Bind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
